title: A Curiouse and diverse flora. Pt. 4: change and survival
creator_credit: Australian Academy of Science and CSIRO
brief_description: Shows how plants have adapted to the range of climatic conditions to be found in Australia, from the dry inland to the tropical rainforests. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
